text: Anɨb ak mam ay sɨkop, apnan gɨpɨm ñɨn ak, tay gɨnɨmɨb? Nɨbi mɨdupsek wog mɨdebɨm. Olap kɨmep agup, olap God takaw tep agyɨkup, olap God gos ne ak mɨseŋ lɨl nop agek agñub, olap God Kawnan ne ak nop kɨles ñek takaw yɨbɨl keke agup, olap takaw yɨbɨl keke apal anɨb okok nɨŋɨd tɨg adɨkɨl agñub. Tap anɨb okok mɨdupsek gɨpɨm ak, Klays binɨb ne okok kɨli nɨŋɨd gos sek mɨdɨl kɨles gɨl jak tep gɨl yenɨgel agɨl nep gɨnɨmɨb.
